story.name: LookupADefinition.story
story.scenarios: Scenario:Looking up the definition of '<word>' Given the user is on the Wikionary home page When the user looks up the definition of the word '<word>' Then they should see the definition '<definition>'

story.name: LookupADidYouMean.story
story.scenarios: Scenario:Looking up the definition of a wrong spelled '<word>' Given the user is on the Wikionary home page When the user looks up the definition of the word '<word>' Then they should see the tip '<didYouMean>'
